about.summary: Jekyll plugin for building Jekyll sites with any GitHub-hosted theme

name: rb-jekyll-remote-theme
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "jekyll-remote-theme" %}
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}

package:
  name: rb-{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://rubygems.org/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  sha256: 23a1454dcfec8e12d7a3f2ab08406ccc690df09563f766bf67af5131d6c2d907

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0
  script:
    - gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win }}

requirements:
  host:
    - ruby
  run:
    - ruby
    - rb-addressable >=2.0,<3
    - rb-jekyll >=3.5,<4
    - rb-rubyzip >=1.2.1,<3.0

test:
  requires:
    - rb-jekyll >=3.0
  commands:
    - ruby -r {{ name }} -e 'exit 0'

about:
  home: https://rubygems.org/gems/{{ name }}
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Jekyll plugin for building Jekyll sites with any GitHub-hosted theme

  doc_url: https://www.rubydoc.info/gems/{{ name }}
  dev_url: https://github.com/benbalter/{{ name }}

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - sodre
